flawed_nl_solution:
The trucks and regular cars make up 72% of her collection because 64+8 equals <<64+8=72>>72
This means convertibles make up 33% of her collection because 100-72 equals 33.
She has 35 convertibles because 125 times 0.28 equals <<125*0.28=35>>35
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 33. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
